detectors.description: Lottery.getHash(uint256) (Lottery.sol#663-665) uses a weak PRNG: keccak256(bytes)(abi.encode(secret)) (Lottery.sol#664)
Lottery.drawNumbers(uint256) (Lottery.sol#639-661) uses a weak PRNG: b == 0 (Lottery.sol#647)
Lottery.drawNumbers(uint256) (Lottery.sol#639-661) uses a weak PRNG: a == 0 (Lottery.sol#646)
Lottery.drawNumbers(uint256) (Lottery.sol#639-661) uses a weak PRNG: numbers (Lottery.sol#660)
Lottery.random(uint256,uint256) (Lottery.sol#667-669) uses a weak PRNG: uint256(getHash(seed)) % max (Lottery.sol#668)
Lottery.drawNumbers(uint256) (Lottery.sol#639-661) uses a weak PRNG: j_scope_2 > 0 && numbers[j_scope_2 - 1] > n (Lottery.sol#655)
